name: Call Center.INC
description:
Welcome to the company call center.inc , as you know the government has taken measures to manage the rioters in the city. By the company we will help people who have problems, your duty is to manage the connection between the caller and the units correctly, which is very easy. You just look at what problems the person you need to deal with and the system sends you their name and trouble code. Lets you decode what the submitted problem is. if you work well, you get a bonus, but if you miss even one. 

GET THE FUCK OUT OF MY COMPANY AND GO FIND A NEW JOB ELSEWHERE !
